- Location: Facade, central door, corniche over right (south) pillar

#### Cartouche {-}
<div class="col2">
| ^1^ *nsw.t-bjty*  
| *nb-tȝ.wy*  
| (*twmtyns (nty)-ḫwj*)|  
| ^1^ King of Upper and Lower Egypt,  
| Lord of the Two Lands,  
| Domitian Augustus.  
</div>

#### Title {-}
<div class="col2">

| ^2^ *jr mḏ n jt=[f]*  
|
| ^2^ Doing unguent for [his] father.  

</div>

#### Khnum-Re {-}
<div class="col2">
| ^3^ *ẖnmw-Rʿ nb tȝ-^4^sn.t*  
|
| ^3^ Khnum-Re Lord of E^4^sna.  
</div>
